title: Disable Kubernetes Extension

labels.name: triage/out-of-date
labels.description: This issue/PR is no longer valid or relevant

body:
### Describe the bug

I want to disable the Kubernetes extension in the `test` profile, but I do still want it during `prod`. (It seems to be using a lot of memory and I'm not utilizing it during tests anyway.) Is there anyway to do this?

I tried:

```yaml
"%test":
  quarkus:
    kubernetes:
      enabled: false
```

But this doesn't seem to work. I would think there must be a way to disable different extensions for different profiles.

### Expected behavior

The extension is disabled

### Actual behavior

The extension is not disabled
